trans-unit.source: Specifies a print controller that sends information to a printer.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un controller di stampa che invia informazioni alla stampante.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> uses this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> utilizza questa classe.

trans-unit.source: For more information on printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla stampa, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> panoramica dello spazio dei nomi.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> che rappresenta il documento da stampare.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to print a page in the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati relativi alle modalit√† di stampa di una pagina nel documento.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Completa la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare una pagina di un documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> viene chiamato immediatamente dopo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento.

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> is not called.
trans-unit.target: Se viene generata un'eccezione all'interno di un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento di un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> non viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto che viene inviato alla stampante.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto su un'immagine di una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> metodo la deallocazione.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> is called from a printing context of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting> is required.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> viene chiamato da un contesto di stampa di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting> √® obbligatorio.

trans-unit.source: Printing to the default printer requires a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.DefaultPrinting>.
trans-unit.target: Stampa la stampante predefinita richiede un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.DefaultPrinting>.

trans-unit.source: All other calls this method requires a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting>
trans-unit.target: Tutte le altre chiamate di questo metodo richiede un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting>

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not finish writing to a page.
trans-unit.target: L'API Win32 nativa non ha completato la scrittura nella pagina.

trans-unit.source: for controlling access to printers.
trans-unit.target: Per controllare l'accesso alle stampanti.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione correlata: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> che rappresenta il documento da stampare.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati relativi alla modalit√† di stampa del documento.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Completa la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare un documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> viene chiamato immediatamente dopo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> evento.

trans-unit.source: Even if an uncaught exception was thrown during the printing process, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Anche se √® stata generata un'eccezione non rilevata durante il processo di stampa <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto che viene inviato alla stampante.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto su un'immagine di una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> metodo la deallocazione.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not complete the print job.
trans-unit.target: L'API Win32 nativa non ha completato il processo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 API could not delete the specified device context (DC).
trans-unit.target: L'API Win32 nativa non ha eliminato il contesto di periferica (DC) specificato.

trans-unit.source: for controlling access to printers.
trans-unit.target: Per controllare l'accesso alle stampanti.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione correlata: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> che rappresenta il documento da stampare.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to print a page in the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati relativi alle modalit√† di stampa di una pagina nel documento.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics" /> property of this parameter will be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizialmente la propriet√† <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics" /> di questo parametro sar√† <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The value returned from the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument,System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs)" /> method will be used to set this property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore restituito dal metodo <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument,System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs)" /> sar√† utilizzato per impostare la propriet√†.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: Avvia la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare una pagina in un documento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object that represents a page from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> che rappresenta una pagina di un <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> is called immediately before <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> viene chiamato immediatamente prima <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used in printing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto utilizzato per la stampa.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto su un'immagine di una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> metodo la deallocazione.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not prepare the printer driver to accept data.
trans-unit.target: L'API Win32 nativa non ha completato la preparazione del driver di stampa per accettare i dati.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 API could not update the specified printer or plotter device context (DC) using the specified information.
trans-unit.target: L'API Win32 nativa non ha completato l'aggiornamento del contesto di periferica (DC) della stampante o del plotter specificato utilizzando le informazioni specificate.

trans-unit.source: for controlling access to printers.
trans-unit.target: Per controllare l'accesso alle stampanti.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione correlata: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> che rappresenta il documento da stampare.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati relativi alla modalit√† di stampa del documento.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Avvia la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare un documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato immediatamente dopo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used in printing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto utilizzato per la stampa.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto su un'immagine di una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> metodo la deallocazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> verifies that the printer settings are valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> verifica che le impostazioni della stampante siano valide.

trans-unit.source: The printer settings are not valid.
trans-unit.target: Le impostazioni della stampante non sono valide.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not start a print job.
trans-unit.target: L'API Win32 nativa non ha avviato un processo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: for controlling access to printers.
trans-unit.target: Per controllare l'accesso alle stampanti.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione correlati: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />
